results.title: Mango Ginger Kale Green Smoothie

steps.step: Add ice to the blender first and crush. Then add kale, mango, peaches, ginger, lemon juice (starting with 1 lemon (2 Tbsp or 30 ml) and working your way up) and 1 cup water (240 ml) to start. The amount of water will depend on how many of your ingredients are frozen.Blend until smooth, only adding water a little at a time as needed, and scraping down the sides/mixing as needed.Once well blended, taste and adjust seasonings as needed. If too tart, add more fruit or a little maple syrup (optional). For more zing, add ginger. And for more acidity, add more lemon juice. To make it thicker/colder, add more ice. Blend as needed.Divide between two serving glasses and enjoy immediately. Best when fresh, though leftovers will keep covered in the refrigerator for 24 hours.

ingredients.name: juice of lemon
ingredients.original: 1 1/2 - 2 lemons or limes, juiced ( - 1/4 cup or 60 ml)
ingredients.originalString: 1 1/2 - 2 lemons or limes, juiced ( - 1/4 cup or 60 ml)
ingredients.originalName: lemons or limes, juiced ( - 1/4 cup or 60 ml)

ingredients.name: kale
ingredients.original: 2 cups ( - 60 g) kale, packed, fresh or frozen (organic when possible)
ingredients.originalString: 2 cups ( - 60 g) kale, packed, fresh or frozen (organic when possible)
ingredients.originalName: cups kale, packed, fresh or frozen (organic when possible)

ingredients.name: mango
ingredients.original: 1 cup (165 g) ripe frozen mango cubes (organic when possible)
ingredients.originalString: 1 cup (165 g) ripe frozen mango cubes (organic when possible)
ingredients.originalName: cup ripe frozen mango cubes (organic when possible)

ingredients.name: maple syrup
ingredients.original: optional: 1 Tbsp (15 ml) maple syrup (depending on sweetness of fruit)
ingredients.originalString: optional: 1 Tbsp (15 ml) maple syrup (depending on sweetness of fruit)
ingredients.originalName: optional: 1 Tbsp maple syrup (depending on sweetness of fruit)

ingredients.name: peaches
ingredients.original: 1 cup (150 g) ripe frozen peaches (organic when possible)
ingredients.originalString: 1 cup (150 g) ripe frozen peaches (organic when possible)
ingredients.originalName: cup ripe frozen peaches (organic when possible)

ingredients.original: 1 1/2 - 2 lemons or limes, juiced ( - 1/4 cup or 60 ml)

results.title: Cucumber Noodles with Asparagus and Ginger Scallion Sesame Sauce (Gluten-Free, Grain-Free, Vegan, Paleo)

steps.step: In a large bowl whisk together the scallions, ginger, toasted sesame oil , olive oil, coconut aminos , red pepper flakes .  Taste and add a pinch of salt if needed.  Set aside while you make the asparagus and cucumber noodles. Bring a pot of salted water to a boil. Blanch the asparagus spears until crisp tender (about 2 minutes) then drain and shock in a bowl of ice water to stop the cooking and set color.Using a julienne peeler  or spiralizer create long noodles from the peeled cucumbers.  (If using a julienne peeler, run it lengthwise until you reach the core then turn a ¼ turn and repeat all the way around. Toss the cucumber noodles with the ginger scallion sauce, add the cooled blanched asparagus and toss gently again to combine.
Sprinkle with toasted sesame seeds  and serve.

ingredients.name: asparagus
ingredients.original: 1 bunch asparagus, ends trimmed and sliced on the diagonal into 2 inch pieces
ingredients.originalString: 1 bunch asparagus, ends trimmed and sliced on the diagonal into 2 inch pieces
ingredients.originalName: asparagus, ends trimmed and sliced on the diagonal into 2 inch pieces

ingredients.name: coconut aminos
ingredients.original: 1 1/2 Tablespoons/23ml coconut aminos or gluten-free tamari
ingredients.originalString: 1 1/2 Tablespoons/23ml coconut aminos or gluten-free tamari

ingredients.name: fresh ginger
ingredients.original: 1 2 to 3 inch piece of fresh ginger, peeled and grated on a microplane or fine zester
ingredients.originalString: 1 2 to 3 inch piece of fresh ginger, peeled and grated on a microplane or fine zester
ingredients.originalName: fresh ginger, peeled and grated on a microplane or fine zester

ingredients.original: 2 Tablespoons/30ml olive oil (chose one with a fairly light and neutral flavor)

ingredients.originalName: 30ml olive oil (chose one with a fairly light and neutral flavor)

ingredients.originalName: 8th teaspoon red pepper flakes , or more to taste

ingredients.name: scallions
ingredients.original: 2 to 3 small scallions (green onions), thinly sliced

results.title: African Potato and Cauliflower Stew

steps.step: Heat oil in a large pot or cast iron Dutch oven over medium heat.

Add onions and garlic, cooking for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until onions are softened. Stir in red chile flakes, ground coriander, ginger, cumin, cinnamon and cayenne and cook for 2 more minutes.

Add russet potatoes, stir in the water, tomato sauce, and apple sauce. Turn heat up to high and bring to a boil. Lower the heat and simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes. *Alternatively, you can add all remaining ingredients and transfer to a slow cooker and cook on low for 6 hours.Stir in the cauliflower, sweet potato, collard greens and apricots. Cover and continue to cook for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the potatoes and sweet potatoes are fork tender.

ingredients.name: cashews
ingredients.original: Garnish: chopped peanuts or cashews, chopped cilantro
ingredients.originalString: Garnish: chopped peanuts or cashews, chopped cilantro
ingredients.originalName: Garnish: chopped peanuts or cashews, chopped cilantro

ingredients.name: cauliflower
ingredients.original: 2 cups cauliflower, cut into bite-size florets
ingredients.originalString: 2 cups cauliflower, cut into bite-size florets

ingredients.name: idaho potatoes
ingredients.original: 2 Idaho russet potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
ingredients.originalString: 2 Idaho russet potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
ingredients.originalName: Idaho russet potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes

ingredients.name: yam
ingredients.original: 1 medium sweet potato or yam, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
ingredients.originalString: 1 medium sweet potato or yam, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
ingredients.originalName: sweet potato or yam, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes

results.title: Thai Ginger Salmon Basil Arugula Salad

steps.step: Preheat oven to broil
Mix marinade ingredients in a bowl, place salmon in glass dish, cover with marinade and set aside
In a bowl, combine dressing ingredients; mix well and place in refrigerator until ready to use
Place salmon into oven for about 8 minutes
While salmon is cooking, slice cucumbers
In a large bowl add cucumbers, arugula, and basil
Remove salmon, let cool for 5 minutes, chop up and place on top of salad
Serve with dressing

results.title: Slow Cooker Jerk Chicken

steps.step: Place scallion, oil, habaneros, ginger, molasses, garlic, thyme, all spice, cardamom, and salt in a food processor or blender and puree.
Transfer 1/2 cup mixture to slow cooker; reserve remaining mixture.
Add chicken to slow cooker and coat evenly with scallion mixture. cover and cook until chick is tender, about 4- 6 hours on low.Position oven rack 10 inches from broiler element and start broiler.
Place a wire rack in a foil lined bake sheet and coat with vegetable spray.
Transfer chicken, skin side down onto rack.

Brush chicken with half of reserved scallion mixture and broil until lightly charge and and crisp, about 10-15 minutes. Flip chicken over, brush with remaining scallion mixture and continue to broil until lightly charred and crisp on second side, about 5-10 minutes.
Serve with lime wedges.

ingredients.name: chicken pieces
ingredients.original: 4 pounds bone-in, skin-on chicken pieces (split breasts, thighs)

results.title: Keto Sheet Pan Hibachi Beef & Vegetables

steps.step: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.
Combine all of the marinade ingredients in a medium sized bowl.

Add the pieces of beef (or other protein) to the marinade, and stir to coat.Separate the onion rings and form into two cones on a large baking sheet.  (OR just toss the rings with the other vegetables before roasting.)
Combine the remaining vegetables on the same baking sheet.
Add the oil, salt, and pepper and stir to coat the vegetables.
Spread the vegetables out on the sheet and place in the oven.
Bake for 20 minutes.
Remove the pan from the oven and move the vegetables to one side to make room for the beef.
Add the beef to the pan, making sure the pieces are separated.
Pour the marinade over the beef.Return the pan to the oven and roast for another 8 minutes, or until the meat is cooked to your liking.  Dont overcook or it will become dry and chewy.
Remove from the oven and stir the beef and vegetables together with the sauce.
Serve immediately over cooked cauliflower rice if desired.

results.title: Sesame Ginger Steamed Broccoli

steps.step: Place broccoli, ginger, sesame oil, and 1/4 cup water in large (2- to 3-qt.) pot. Cover, and bring to a simmer over medium heat. Steam 5 minutes, or until broccoli is bright green and crisp-tender.
Sprinkle with salt to taste and sesame seeds.

ingredients.name: broccoli
ingredients.original: 1 lb. broccoli, cut into medium florets (6 cups loosely packed)

results.title: Easy Chick Pea and Spinach Indian Curry

steps.step: Cook rice on a rice cooker or stove top, set aside.In a large sauce pan, at medium heat, add the olive oil  followed by the onions, garlic and ginger. Cook for about 5 minutes or until onions are translucent.
Add the spices over low heat and stir.
Add the chopped tomatoes and cook for 2-3 minutes.Increase the temperature to medium-high heat and add the chickpeas, tomato puree and water.
Mix through and let it cook for about 5-10 minutes until the flavors are combined.
Add the frozen spinach, salt to taste and cook further for 3-5 minutes.
Serve over the brown rice and sprinkle with the chopped coriander if desired.

ingredients.name: canned chickpeas
ingredients.original: 1 1lb can of chickpeas, also called garbanzo beans, drained.
ingredients.originalString: 1 1lb can of chickpeas, also called garbanzo beans, drained.
ingredients.originalName: chickpeas, also called garbanzo beans, drained

ingredients.original: 6 oz chopped frozen spinach, thawed and drained
ingredients.originalString: 6 oz chopped frozen spinach, thawed and drained
ingredients.originalName: chopped frozen spinach, thawed and drained

ingredients.original: 1 1/2 cup of water, if the sauce is too thick add more water
